resourceGroupNameParameter.description: Name of the resource group to which the resource belongs.
resourceGroupNameParameter.name: resourceGroupName

subscriptionIdParameter.description: Your Azure subscription ID. This is a GUID-formatted string (e.g. 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000).
subscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId

AddressResponse.description: Describes main public IP address and any extra virtual IPs.

internalIpAddress.description: Virtual Network internal IP address of the App Service Environment if it is in internal load-balancing mode.

outboundIpAddresses.description: IP addresses appearing on outbound connections.

nextLink.description: Link to next page of resources.

AppServiceEnvironmentPatchResource.description: ARM resource for a app service environment.

EndpointDependency.description: A domain name that a service is reached at, including details of the current connection status.

domainName.description: The domain name of the dependency.

endpointDetails.description: The IP Addresses and Ports used when connecting to DomainName.

EndpointDetail.description: Current TCP connectivity information from the App Service Environment to a single endpoint.

ipAddress.description: An IP Address that Domain Name currently resolves to.

isAccessable.description: Whether it is possible to create a TCP connection from the App Service Environment to this IpAddress at this Port.

latency.description: The time in milliseconds it takes for a TCP connection to be created from the App Service Environment to this IpAddress at this Port.

port.description: The port an endpoint is connected to.

HostingEnvironmentDiagnostics.description: Diagnostics for an App Service Environment.

InboundEnvironmentEndpoint.description: The IP Addresses and Ports that require inbound network access to and within the subnet of the App Service Environment.

description.description: Short text describing the purpose of the network traffic.

endpoints.description: The IP addresses that network traffic will originate from in cidr notation.

ports.description: The ports that network traffic will arrive to the App Service Environment at.

nextLink.description: Link to next page of resources.

retention.description: Retention period for the current time grain.

displayName.description: Friendly name shown in the UI.

metricAvailabilities.description: List of time grains supported for the metric together with retention period.

OutboundEnvironmentEndpoint.description: Endpoints accessed for a common purpose that the App Service Environment requires outbound network access to.

category.description: The type of service accessed by the App Service Environment, e.g., Azure Storage, Azure SQL Database, and Azure Active Directory.

endpoints.description: The endpoints that the App Service Environment reaches the service at.

nextLink.description: Link to next page of resources.

capacity.description: Min, max, and default scale values of the SKU.

resourceType.description: Resource type that this SKU applies to.

sku.description: Name and tier of the SKU.

nextLink.description: Link to next page of resources.
Link to next page of resources.

computeMode.description: Compute mode used for this usage.

currentValue.description: The current value of the resource counter.

displayName.description: Friendly name shown in the UI.

nextResetTime.description: Next reset time for the resource counter.

siteMode.description: Site mode used for this usage.

unit.description: Units of measurement for the quota resource.

nextLink.description: Link to next page of resources.
Link to next page of resources.

WorkerPoolResource.description: Worker pool of an App Service Environment ARM resource.
